fields.label: üìÑ Article Excerpt
fields.description: Brief summary for previews and SEO (max 300 characters)

fields.name: updatedDate
fields.label: Last Updated
fields.description: Optional: When the post was last significantly updated

fields.name: heroImage
fields.label: üñºÔ∏è Featured Image Options
fields.description: Choose how to add your featured image

fields.name: uploadedImage
fields.label: Upload Image File
fields.description: Upload an image (recommended: 1200x630px) - Use this if you selected 'Upload'

fields.name: externalUrl
fields.label: External Image URL
fields.description: Paste the full URL (e.g., https://images.unsplash.com/photo-123...) - Use this if you selected 'URL'

fields.name: alt
fields.label: Alt Text (Required)
fields.description: Describe the image for accessibility and SEO

fields.name: caption
fields.label: Image Caption
fields.description: Optional caption displayed below the image

fields.name: image
fields.label: Legacy Image (Backup)
fields.description: Fallback image field for existing posts

fields.name: imageAlt
fields.label: Legacy Alt Text
fields.description: Alt text for legacy image field

fields.name: category
fields.label: üè∑Ô∏è Content Pillar
fields.description: Select the main content pillar for this post

fields.name: storyType
fields.label: Story Layout
fields.description: Choose the story format and layout style

fields.name: featured
fields.label: Featured Post
fields.description: Show this post in featured section on homepage

fields.name: trending
fields.label: Trending Post
fields.description: Mark as trending (shows in trending section)

fields.name: readTime
fields.label: Reading Time
fields.description: e.g., '5 min read' (auto-calculated if left empty)

fields.name: hasAudio
fields.label: üéß Has Audio Version
fields.description: Check if this article has an audio version

fields.name: audioUrl
fields.label: Audio File URL
fields.description: Link to MP3 or audio file (only fill if Has Audio is checked)

fields.name: audioDuration
fields.label: Audio Duration
fields.description: e.g., '12:30' (only fill if Has Audio is checked)

fields.name: audioTranscript
fields.label: Audio Transcript
fields.description: Full audio transcript for accessibility (only fill if Has Audio is checked)

fields.name: customSEO
fields.label: Use Custom SEO
fields.description: Override default SEO with custom values

fields.name: title
fields.label: SEO Title
fields.description: Custom title for search engines (max 60 chars) - only use if Custom SEO is checked

fields.name: description
fields.label: Meta Description
fields.description: Custom description for search engines (max 300 chars) - only use if Custom SEO is checked

fields.name: canonical
fields.label: Canonical URL
fields.description: If this content was published elsewhere first - only use if Custom SEO is checked

fields.name: noindex
fields.label: No Index
fields.description: Prevent search engines from indexing this post

fields.name: body
fields.label: üìù Article Content
fields.description: Write your article content. Use the toolbar to add images, videos, and other media blocks.

defaultItem.title: Stay Updated with TinkByte
defaultItem.description: Get practical insights delivered weekly. No fluff, just actionable content.

fields.name: description
fields.label: Value Proposition
fields.description: What specific value do subscribers get?

fields.name: uploadedImage
fields.label: Upload Image
fields.description: Use this if you selected 'Upload File' above

fields.name: externalUrl
fields.label: Image URL
fields.description: Paste image URL (e.g., https://images.unsplash.com/...) - Use this if you selected 'External URL' above

fields.name: enableLightbox
fields.label: Enable Lightbox
fields.description: Allow image to be clicked for full-size view (recommended for medium/large/full images)

fields.name: description
fields.label: Video Description
fields.description: Optional description displayed below the video

fields.name: startTime
fields.label: Start Time
fields.description: Start time in seconds (for YouTube/Vimeo only)

fields.name: customColor
fields.label: Custom Color
fields.description: Hex color code for custom callout (only use if Custom type is selected)

fields.name: dismissible
fields.label: Dismissible
fields.description: Allow users to close this callout (recommended for info/tip types)

fields.name: customLanguage
fields.label: Custom Language
fields.description: Specify custom language name (only use if 'Other' is selected above)

fields.name: showLineNumbers
fields.label: Show Line Numbers
fields.description: Display line numbers in code block

fields.name: highlightLines
fields.label: Highlight Lines
fields.description: Comma-separated line numbers to highlight (e.g., '1,3,5-7') - only use if line numbers are enabled

defaultItem.quote: The future belongs to those who build it.
defaultItem.author: TinkByte Team

fields.name: role
fields.label: Author Role/Title
fields.description: Only fill if author is provided

fields.name: company
fields.label: Author Company
fields.description: Only fill if author is provided

fields.name: avatar
fields.label: Author Avatar URL
fields.description: Optional: Link to author's photo (recommended for card/featured styles)

fields.name: citation
fields.label: Citation/Source
fields.description: Source of the quote (book, article, etc.) - recommended for featured/card styles

fields.name: customColor
fields.label: Custom Button Color
fields.description: Hex color code for custom button (only use if Custom style is selected)

fields.name: openInNewTab
fields.label: Open in New Tab
fields.description: Open the link in a new browser tab

fields.name: iconPosition
fields.label: Icon Position
fields.description: Position of icon (only use if icon is provided)

fields.name: caption
fields.label: Table Caption
fields.description: Optional caption displayed above the table

fields.name: headers
fields.label: Table Headers
fields.description: Column headers for the table (only fill if Has Header Row is checked)

fields.name: cells
fields.label: Row Data
fields.description: Data for each cell in this row

fields.name: sortable
fields.label: Sortable Columns
fields.description: Allow users to sort table columns (recommended when headers are enabled)

fields.name: customRatio
fields.label: Custom Ratio
fields.description: e.g., '60-40', '70-30' (only use if Custom Ratio is selected)

fields.name: stackOnMobile
fields.label: Stack on Mobile
fields.description: Stack columns vertically on mobile devices

fields.name: caption
fields.label: Gallery Caption

fields.label: Auto-play Speed (seconds)

fields.name: caption

fields.description: Optional caption for this specific image
